IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE PENNSYLVANIA BANKERS ASSOCIATION CONTINUES TO BE THE LEADING FINANCIAL SERVICES TRADE ASSOCIATION, DEDICATED TO STRENGTHENING AND PROVIDING VALUE TO INSTITUTIONS OF ALL SIZES THROUGH EXCEPTIONAL ADVOCACY, EDUCATION, LEADERSHIP AND MEMBER RELATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PENNSYLVANIA BANKERS ASSOCIATION CONTINUES TO BE THE LEADING FINANCIAL SERVICES TRADE ASSOCIATION, DEDICATED TO STRENGTHENING AND PROVIDING VALUE TO INSTITUTIONS OF ALL SIZES THROUGH EXCEPTIONAL ADVOCACY, EDUCATION, LEADERSHIP AND MEMBER RELATIONS.

THE PENNSYLVANIA BANKERS ASSOCIATION CONTINUES TO BE THE LEADING FINANCIAL SERVICES TRADE ASSOCIATION, DEDICATED TO STRENGTHENING AND PROVIDING VALUE TO INSTITUTIONS OF ALL SIZES THROUGH EXCEPTIONAL ADVOCACY, EDUCATION, LEADERSHIP AND MEMBER RELATIONS.
THE ORGANIZATION IS MADE UP OF MEMBER BANKS.
MEMBERS OF THE ORGANIZATION ELECT THE MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY.
MEMBERS VOTE AT THE ANNUAL MEETING OR BY BALLOTS.
MANAGEMENT MAKES THE ASSOCIATION'S COMPLETED ANNUAL IRS FORM 990 AVAILABLE TO THE BOARD FOR ITS REVIEW AT LEAST 7 DAYS PRIOR TO FILING IT ON THE ASSOCIATION'S BEHALF.
A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ACKNOWLEDGEMENT AND DISCLOSURE FORM IS COMPLETED AND SIGNED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND SENIOR STAFF OF THE ORGANIZATION.

THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND APPROVES COMPENSATION FOR TOP OFFICIALS AND KEY EMPLOYEES. THE COMMITTEE RELIES ON COMPARABILITY DATA INCLUDING EXPERT COMPENSATION STUDIES WHEN DETERMINING AND APPROVING COMPENSATION FOR DESIGNATED INDIVIDUALS.

THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND APPROVES COMPENSATION FOR TOP OFFICIALS AND KEY EMPLOYEES. THE COMMITTEE RELIES ON COMPARABILITY DATA INCLUDING EXPERT COMPENSATION STUDIES WHEN DETERMINING AND APPROVING COMPENSATION FOR DESIGNATED INDIVIDUALS.
GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
